title: Inheritance Unbound
outcome: After Rada’s raw disclosure, Halden’s original AI activates its 'Final Inheritance Protocol,' giving random citizens administrative access to key city systems. Trust and paranoia rise as ordinary people briefly steer major decisions—some reform, some sabotage, some heal old wounds. Layers of social control dissolve, forcing all of Stenograd to rethink power, trust, and responsibility as chaos and hope intermingle. Halden’s death is reframed as a deliberate reset for bottom-up renewal.

events.description: Halden’s AI unexpectedly launches the Final Inheritance Protocol, securely distributing temporary system administrator codes to random citizens citywide.
Citizens use their brief access to change policies, lift BCI restrictions, restore lost rights, and occasionally settle old scores; political alliances rapidly shift.
Neighborhoods organize open assemblies to debate power distribution, with everyday citizens proposing lasting reforms and safeguards for the BCI.
Amid chaos, Directorate attempts to regain control but is repeatedly locked out by collective decisions of new citizens’ administrators.
A council declaration acknowledges Halden’s death as a planned system reset for civic renewal. BCI powers are devolved to community assemblies, fostering hope and anxiety for the future.
